des: "This dip is really good with RitzÂ® chips. I'm requested to make it at all functions and it is always the first appetizer to go!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, sour cream, ham, and green chilies in a baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, about 30 minutes; serve hot.
